Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Govvy
Reviews.Content: trip started hotel finished hotel fair staff nice invest proper curtains tell manager location city walking distance main sites nice bathrooms time stayed bathroom decent size time bathroom getting nights sleep depend location hotel train station noisey lift loud change turkey update rules europe deem illegal life resturant top floor nice views breakfast decent little selection suit decent stay

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: Ali D
Reviews.Content: pro available price range nice staff nice polite fantastic views istanbul breakfast terrace extensive selection breakfast food havent found con annoying sound hear level 3 train station outside elevator kept hearing throughout stay reception staff guy looks chewing time talk annoying try sell commission found rude times

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff...”
Reviews.Author: st_petre
Reviews.Content: selected hotel location located downtown near tram station gulhane im mistaken 1015 minutes walk major attractions ayia sofia sultan ahmed staff welcoming friendly located close police stations souvenir shop hotel

Reviews.Title: “Friendly City Centre hotel”
Reviews.Author: JosephineSalvador
Reviews.Content: hotel heart istanbul close major attractions simple hotel friendly staff clean breakfasts little hard tram light rail tourist office directly opposite station direct value money

Reviews.Title: “great city trip hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jo_ba2005
Reviews.Content: family stayed 2 nights lovely hotel istanbul pretty tricky hotel dont gps driving directions car streets pretty oneway getting hotel called reception immediately sent hotel clean chic clean bathroom bit extremely tasteful clean internet access free charge hotel parking spaces breakfast wasnt varied ok plus hotel location close topkapi palace sultanahmet park train station exactly hotel shops restaurants tram station close accessible nice hotel extremely helpful staff close main sights european istanbul nice restaurants shops
